channel.title: Kripanshu Singh - Software Engineering Blog
channel.description: Practical guides on web development, authentication, and full-stack development from Software Engineer Kripanshu Singh

item.title: JWT vs Sessions: Complete Authentication Guide 2025
item.description: Software Engineer explains JWT vs Sessions with practical examples, code samples, and a quick decision framework. Learn which authentication method to choose for your project with real-world insights.
item.author: kripanshusingh160305@gmail.com (Kripanshu Singh)
